member.summary: Activates 2FA for the user if code is valid.

member.name: M:SE_StA_API.Authentication.TwoFactor.TwoFactorAuthController.Disable(System.String)
member.summary: Deactivates 2FA for the user if code is valid.

member.name: M:SE_StA_API.Authentication.TwoFactor.TwoFactorAuthController.IsEnabled
member.summary: Returns wether or not 2FA is enabled (for the current user).
